main event: A civilian witness reported observing two oval-shaped objects emitting blue and red lights hovering approximately 50-75 feet off the ground for about 1-1/2 minutes in South Tewksbury, Massachusetts on August 30, 1960.
interesting points: The sighting involved two objects, one larger than the other., The objects were reported to be hovering for about 1-1/2 minutes., The lights emitted were described as blue and red., A letter from the Public Information Office acknowledged the report but couldn't determine its nature., There was a follow-up report regarding a bright light observation on a different date.
sighted object: two oval-shaped objects with blue and red lights
